intro: Sobralia gentryi, commonly known as the Gentry's sobralia, is a flowering plant belonging to the orchid family, Orchidaceae. It is native to the cloud forests of Costa Rica and is characterized by its striking, showy inflorescences. The plant features dark green, strap-like leaves and produces fragrant, pink to purple flowers that bloom in late winter to early spring. It is a terrestrial orchid that thrives in humid, shaded environments with well-drained soil. Due to its rarity and specific habitat requirements, Sobralia gentryi is considered an endangered species.
